name: ğŸš« ERROR HANDLING & RECOVERY SYSTEM
description: Comprehensive error handling, recovery strategies, and security monitoring for all workflows

parameters.jsonBody:
={{ {
  "error_id": $json.errorAnalysis?.errorId || $json.criticalAlert?.alertId || $json.recoveryResponse?.recoveryAttempt?.attemptId || 'unknown',
  "error_type": $json.errorAnalysis?.classification?.type || 'UNKNOWN',
  "priority": $json.errorAnalysis?.classification?.priority || $json.criticalAlert?.severity || 'MEDIUM',
  "source": $json.errorAnalysis?.originalError?.source || 'unknown',
  "message": $json.errorAnalysis?.originalError?.message || 'No message provided',
  "error_code": $json.errorAnalysis?.originalError?.code || null,
  "request_id": $json.errorAnalysis?.originalError?.requestId || null,
  "workflow_id": $json.errorAnalysis?.originalError?.workflowId || null,
  "recovery_strategy": $json.errorAnalysis?.recovery?.strategy || null,
  "retry_count": $json.recoveryResponse?.recoveryAttempt?.retryCount || $json.errorAnalysis?.recovery?.currentRetryCount || 0,
  "max_retries": $json.errorAnalysis?.recovery?.maxRetries || 0,
  "escalated": $json.criticalAlert ? true : ($json.interventionReport ? true : false),
  "resolved": false,
  "impact_assessment": JSON.stringify($json.errorAnalysis?.impact || {}),
  "recovery_actions": JSON.stringify($json.errorAnalysis?.recoveryPlan || {}),
  "error_details": JSON.stringify($json),
  "created_at": new Date().toISOString()
} }}
